entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
